snippet: The Commerce Department said new orders for manufactured goods declined 1.0 percent in September after a downwardly revised 2.1 percent drop in August.
abstract: Commerce Dept reports new orders for manufactured goods in United States dropped 1 percent in September, second consecutive month of falling numbers of new orders.
lead_paragraph: The Commerce Department said new orders for manufactured goods declined 1.0 percent in September after a downwardly revised 2.1 percent drop in August.

headline.print_headline: Factory Orders Decline Again, but Auto Sales Stay Strong
